caption.p: Relative expression (in fold) of auxin oxidising gene DAO (Dioxygenase for Auxin Oxidation) and ethylene synthesizing gene ACCS (ACC synthase) in the apical and basal spikelets of the panicle of high sterile (SR-159) over low sterile (SR-157) rice genotypes and in the basal over apical spikelets SR-157 and SR-159 analysed by Real Time PCR (qRT-PCR). The data are means of three replicates and vertical bars represent ± SD values (n = 3).
